tool.name: Extract Orthologous Microsatellites

param.name: separation
param.label: Minimum base pair distance between adjacent microsatellites
param.help: A value of 10 means: Adjacent microsatellites separated by less than 10 base pairs will be excluded from the output.

param.name: mono_threshold
param.label: Minimum Threshold for the number of repeats for mononucleotide microsatellites
param.help: A value of 9 means: All mononucleotide microsatellites having fewer than 9 repeats will be excluded from the output.

param.name: non_mono_threshold
param.label: Minimum Threshold for the number of repeats for non-mononucleotide microsatellites
param.help: A value of 4 means: All non-mononucleotide microsatellites having fewer than 4 repeats will be excluded from the output.

param.name: allow_different_units
param.label: Allow orthologous positions to have different microsatellite repeat units/motifs?

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This tool uses a modified version of SPUTNIK to fetch microsatellite repeats from the input fasta sequences and extracts orthologous repeats from the sputnik output. The modified version allows detection of mononucleotide microsatellites. More information on SPUTNIK can be found on this website_. The modified version is available here_.
-----
.. class:: warningmark
**Note**
- Any block/s not containing exactly 2 species will be omitted.
- This tool will filter out microsatellites based on the user input values for minimum distance and repeat number thresholds. Further, this tool will also filter out microsatellites that have no orthologous microsatellites in one of the species.
.. _website: http://espressosoftware.com/pages/sputnik.jsp .. _here: http://www.bx.psu.edu/svn/universe/dependencies/sputnik/
